name: NCI BUILDING,INC. A/K/A CORNERSTONE BUILDING BRANDS
sampleDescriptions: Whether and American Manufacturer/Seller of metal building systems which engages in no dumping but purchases steel beams from a Mexican affiliate should be excuded from a DOC anti-dumping action/inves
Whether American company with Mexican affiliate,which does not dump steel product should be excluded from Anti-Dumping investigation against China, Canada and Mexico
